name: Amended Post Office Act, 2017
tagline: Expediency to amend the Post Office Act, 1898 for purposes hereinafter appearing
content:
REGISTERED No.-M 302  L.-7646 
The pent of Satan 6=fr,Finies=1  
EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, THURSDAY, AUGUST 31, 2017 
PART I 
Acts, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations 
SENATE SECRETARIAT 
Islamabad, the 30th August, 2017 
No.F.9(15)/2017-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on 29th August, 2017 and is hereby 
published for general information:— 
ACT NO. XXIX OF 2017 
An Act further to amend the Post Office Act, 1898 
WHEREAS it is expedient to amend the Post Office Act, 1898 (VI of 1898), 
for the purposes hereinafter appearing; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:- 
1. 	Short title and commencement—(l) This Act may be called the 
Post Office (Amendment) Act, 2017. 
(1411) 
Price : Rs. 2.00 
[1445(2017)/Ex. Gat] 
1412 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA AUGUST 31, 2017 PART! [ 
(2) It shall come into force at once. 
2. 	Amendment of section 45, Act VI of I898.—In the Post Office 
Act, 1898 (VI of 1898), in section 45, the following amendments shall be made, 
namely:— 
after the word "form", the words "and of such amount" shall be 
inserted; 
for the semicolon at the end, a full stop shall be substituted; and 
the proviso shall be omitted. 
AMJED PERVEZ, 
Secretary 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER. PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD, 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER. STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI.
